page.title: 12LEISURE
page.content:
Originaly before the Bowling Club was built there were tennis courts on the site where it now stands,It was only changed in 1933. Many have joined the club and there are about 200 social members and at least 100 bowling members(ladies & Gents). To become a social member you must be the age 18 or over. Inside there are several sports including darts,skittles,pool & card games. As well as an adult bowling team they have a junior team from the age of 12-18 years of age. The green is 40yds square and so to keep it immaculate they have a gardener. By
{Fiona & Rachel
